data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Kursk, Russia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kursk, Russia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Kursk, Russia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, move the 17,665 believers in the state of Kursk to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Kursk, Russia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Altai people.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Kursk, Russia not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Kursk, Russia to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Kursk to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

location.name: Kursk
location.people_groups_list: Tabasaran, Antsukh, Arab, Uzbeki, Aleut, Eastern, Akhvakh
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tabasaran (900), Antsukh (52,000), Arab, Uzbeki (9,800), Aleut, Eastern (500), Akhvakh (6,800)
